title: Carl Barks Digital Archive Set 1 of 12
description:
Carl Barks Digital Archive Set 1 of 12:

CBDA Set One


This is an update of the previous Carl Barks Library Collection 
and Supplementary bit torrents.
This collection consists of the newest, best scans 
of Carl Barks stories in Carl Barks Library order 
plus final stories, animation and extras.

Set 01: Donald Duck 4c0009-4c0223
Set 02: Donald Duck 4c0238-138
Set 03: Uncle Scrooge 4c0386-020
Set 04: Uncle Scrooge 021-043
Set 05: Uncle Scrooge 044-071
Set 06: Miscellaneous
Set 07: WDC&S 031-094
Set 08: WDC&S 095-166
Set 09: WDC&S 167-229
Set 10: WDC&S 230-312
Set 11: Early Work and Animation
Set 12: Artwork, Articles and Final Stories

CBDA Addendum DD European comics
(for future scanlation purposes)

*********************************

Enjoy!



In this first set, I forgot to change the title 
to "Donald Duck The Ghost of the Grotto CBDA".  
You can type in the new title name once 
you have finished downloading.

*****
Set One version 2 is now available.
(updated a few covers, 2 new scanned stories and trimmed all issues.)
*****

Set Two is now available!

I am still putting together set 8-10,12.  

Found an excellent free disney comics website for updates.
Much thanks goes to that guy who has posted many more recent 
scans of wdc&s stories.  It gives me a quite a few more comics
to update though.

Possible version 2 of Set 1, since I found two new 
nice versions of duck stories on that freedisneycomic 
website and I like to trim the comics as much as possible.
The trimmed comics look really nice on a mini notebook pc!


For set 11, I am encoding mkv videos of Carl Barks' Donald Duck 
short videos from the Chronological Donald Duck. 7 GB of cartoons.
 
For set 12, I can put together Carl Barks' Ducktales .mkv 
videos from the DVDs.


The CBDA collection will be complete, but if you find better scans 
than posted within this collection, then
please leave a message and post up your comic scan.


I will update this list as I go along.
Thanks for helping!


*******************************************
Scan Request of more recent published issues:

*******************************************
* = german, italian comics available for scanlation

Set 1:

DD 4c0108 Seals are so Smart
DD 4c0189 The Old Castle's Secret *

Request list updated and transferred to Set 2 listing.
